name: Spellgrounds
description:
Spellgrounds

A cool online multiplayer fighting game! 

Grab a friend and play!

Fight from 3 different arenas! 

Fight using 3 different spells!

  • Attack spell: Hurt the opponent. 
  • Impulse spell: Push the opponent. 
  • Speed spell: Increase the opponent's speed.

The first player to 3 points wins.

Controls: 

Move - WASD

Jump - Space

Aim - Mouse

Shoot - Left Click 

Charge Spell Shot - Hold Click

Improve Shot Accuracy - Steady your aim (don't move the mouse)

Swap Spell - 1 (Attack), 2 (Impulse), 3 (Speed) 

Spell velocity is affected by your movement. Running forward increases shot speed, running backwards slows shot speed.
